page.title: 08 AN 11 YEAR OLD BOY'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 6.45 am,have a breakfast of cereal and a glass of milk.I feed my calf and a{taxi}takes me to school. It stops at the College and I take about 20 minutes to walk across the park to school.After a{religious {assembly}we have mathematics,sometimes using our{calculators.}For writing we use a{berol pen}in which the ink flows through a fibre tip.Just after 12 o'clock we have a school meal of two courses with a choice for each.Roast chicken with two vegetables,chocolate crisp and custard are popular.After an hour's lunch break,we watch a{video {film,}do project work,art or have music or games.I go home by bus and after tea I play tennis in a club or watch television after I have fed my calf again.I have played in the school teams for soccer,cricket and rounders matches,sometimes away on a Saturday.
